messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Masahide nakago
messages.msgSnippet: Ron, no pic attached, is that Suishinshi Masahide ?, if so, send it to me, I have Suishinshi Masahide Sono no Ichimon and will check it out for you. Rich ...
messages.messageBody:
Ron, no pic attached, is that Suishinshi Masahide ?, if so, send it to
me, I have Suishinshi Masahide Sono no Ichimon and will check it out for
you.

Rich

Ron Hartmann wrote:

> Hi all -
>
> Would somebody who has an authentic please take a look to see how the
> nakago mune and bottom edge is made, and let me know please? See if it
> is rounded (slightly or noticably), flat, etc... Thanks!
> Ron
> STL

messages.subject: Masahide nakago
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Would somebody who has an authentic please take a look to see how the nakago mune and bottom edge is made, and let me know please? See if it is
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Would somebody who has an authentic please take a look to see how the nakago mune and bottom edge is made, and let me know please? See if it is rounded (slightly or noticably), flat, etc... Thanks!
Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
